LanguageData.Tatami_Green.label: Tatami(Green)
LanguageData.Tatami_Green.description: Floor material made of straw.Tatami has a function to purify air and adjust humidity.Also flame retardancy is also very good so it will not burn even if a fire occurs.
LanguageData.Tatami_Yellow.label: Tatami(Yellow)
LanguageData.Tatami_Yellow.description: Floor material made of straw.Tatami has a function to purify air and adjust humidity.Also flame retardancy is also very good so it will not burn even if a fire occurs.
